director.name: 安德烈亚斯·瓦沙科普洛斯 Andreas Varsakopoulos

introduction: This film is reminiscent of Love Death + Robots (2019), as it attempts the sci-fi genre, which is not easy in a short film. The aggressive use of excellent visual effects stands out. It also shows how much effort goes into the art, filming and lighting to create cyberpunk images. This very brave shot at a short film, leads us to look forward to the director’s next one. (KIM Nakyung)
